text: Vladan Živković (15 December 1941 – 3 January 2022) was a Serbian actor. He was best known for his work in Sam Peckinpah's 1977 movie Cross of Iron. He also appeared in England Made Me (1973), Beach Guard in Winter (1976), Special Education (1977), The Tiger (1978), A Tight Spot (1982) and Balkan Spy (1984). Živković was born in Belgrade, Serbia. Živković died on 3 January 2022 in Belgrade at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Actors from Belgrade
title: Vladan Živković
